channel.title: .rar Files
channel.description: I just started with MoparScape today and most of the servers I try to download will save it to the computer, but it won't open because it is .rar. I have opened it with Internet Explorer, which is the recommended file to open with. It start's to work and then says open save. I have tried both of them. Open just repeats it again. Save will just redownload it. Is there anyway to play on private servers without having to download or open them with .rar? And is there any other thing to open them with.

item.title: .rar Files

item.description:
@jarrell1022 wrote:

www.winrar.com download it and it should open itsself maybe u got an unofficial model.
